item.description: This is my dissertation from my BA Politics back in 2008.

item.title: Appadurai’s global scapes.
item.description: I wrote this essay in my third-year of my BA Politics, back in 2008. The module was 'Culture, Globalisation and Power', taught by Adrian Sledmere

item.description: I wrote this essay in my third-year of my BA Politics, back in 2008. The module was 'New Radical Political Economy', taught by Dr Derek Wall.

item.title: Schmitt’s conception of ‘the political’.
